RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the group: Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero, Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez, Jaime Gomez-Arroyo, and seven other undocumented aliens

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero: Defendant who guided a group of nine undocumented aliens, including Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez and Jaime Gomez-Arroyo, from Mexico into the United States for financial gain
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez: Undocumented alien who died during the journey due to heat stroke after becoming ill and being left behind by the group
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jaime Gomez-Arroyo: Uncle of Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez, who remained with her when she became ill and sought help from a nearby ranch hand after she fell asleep and stopped breathing
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero, Alma Delia Si: Group of nine aliens guided by Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero for financial gain
